document_data.name: Taerymdoom
document_data.mainbody: '''Taerymdoom''' was a network of natural caves located in the southern borders of the [[Far Forest]] in the [[Savage Frontier]].
document_data.Description: Those who ventured into these caves said they stretched for several miles underground and were guarded by [[vargouille]]s.
document_data.History: Taerymdoom was named for an [[elf]], [[Taerym]], who was slain by a [[cloaker]] while trying to investigate the caves. Moreover, even a group of [[Zhentarim]] explorers and the [[Darkblades]] of [[Esmeltaran]] lost their lives to this evil place.
